primutils.jei.millstone.title: Millstone
primutils.jei.drying_rack.title: Drying Rack
primutils.jei.chopping_block.title: Chopping Block
primutils.jei.basin.title: Basin
primutils.tooltip.millstone: Right click with an item to add item. Right click with empty hand to rotate. Sneak right click to take item out. All sides support hopper/pipes insertion.
primutils.tooltip.drying_rack: Right click with an item to add item. Sneak right click to take item out. Items will be dried overtime. All sides support hopper/pipes insertion.
primutils.tooltip.chopping_block: Right click with an item to add item. Sneak right click to take item out. Right click with an axe to chop. All sides support hopper/pipes insertion.
primutils.tooltip.basin: Right click with an item to add item. Sneak right click to take item out. Max 4 items can be added. Right click with fluid containers to add/remove fluid. All sides support hopper/pipes insertion for items and fluids.
